title: commit 68f99 causing sysbench oltp_read_write performance degradation 4.4%- 5.3%
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
latest master
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
daily sysbench run

### What did you expect?
no performance degradation

### What did happened?
performance degradation
good commit 7415946640f817245ccedbd95397991ec0650877
bad commit 68f99ae034376f5629d80fa7712796a61dc5d50e
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2316425/188316901-c4f4578d-bf7f-45b1-90af-f5736c486d6d.png)

comments_data.body:
